my favorite part is when the newest hero Illari said "Face the microtransactions!" and turned the PvE into a cash grab.
overwhelmingly common [J]izzard L
this game is shit, never install this steaming pile of disregarded shit

Actual Play Time: 1769 hours since 2016

win or lose, you're still unhappy at the end of the match.
Anything that you can earn in game is pointless. Competitive serves no purpose other than *t i t l e s* and competitive points. Points which are used for Golden Guns.. the very same ones anyone at any rank can buy. 

Only your wallet gets you anything unique, and that isn't even guaranteed.
You can spend $20 or in game currency on a skin, only for Blizzard to release that very same skin on a twitch prime deal for free. 

The 'story' is laughable, and it's only because we've been trickle fed for years that what they've provided now in this current season seems great. 

Blizzard has a very oppressive manner of 'balancing' as well. All of their games, but this one especially. Many of the changes made to heroes come with blatant disregard for community feedback, and serve only to mix up the roster, and force people to relearn new heroes or suffer through the beta test versions of their visions. 
This combined with the lack of incentive to play competitive, makes even quick play games feel sweatier than ever, as the matchmaking is broken right now. 
So even when you're losing, and your hero is broken, and you're wondering what's the point, Blizzard flashes out some new shiny skins to entice you back. Least you have control there. 

Could  be paranoia, but if you can, avoid the game.

Activision Blizzard is just like Mr. Krabs if he abused women and made shitty video games.

I liked it when Reinhardt said Hammer Down, perfectly describing the direction of the thumb in most reviews.
Also Cassidy when he says High Noon, because that's what Activision Blizzard Management said when deciding it was time to force everyone to switch to Overwatch '2'.
And Lucio's Ohhh Jackpot when they realized that they could just add a shop, making everyone to pay absurd amounts of cash for skins.

Thank you for screwing up your last normal game.
Are all new characters only in the battlepass? no thanks.
Enjoy all those who are on the list of blocked regions.
It's sad that overwatch 1 turned out to be such garbage.

To nie moj blizzard to nie moj overwatch

(TLDR: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TRASH UNLESS YOU'RE GOING TO REVIEW BOMB IT, IN THAT CASE, DO. YOUR. PART.)
Lets list off a few things that Blizzard did well when making this game:

1. Sexually Harassing female staff.

2. Drinking on the job.

3. Stealing Breast-milk from female employees.

4. Sexually harass a female staff member until she takes her own life.

5. Retcon the sexuality of their characters (soldier 76) in order to distract the media from their controversies.

6. Rip off their Esport players.

7. Lie to their fan base about all the plans they had for this game.

8. Promise their fans that everything they were told was coming still will but at a later date, whilst already planning amongst each-other to never make due on said promises.

9. let their previous game die so they have the time and effort to make the sequel that would be overwatch 2.

10. Downgrading the experience provided in the original and replace it  with overpriced monetization.

11. Brag about their so called "Blizzard Polish" and allow things like this to exist for nearly 7 years.
https://youtu.be/nFTry5brUiM (This link is to a video showcasing a list of over 50 bugs that one character in OW2 has).

Funny enough, they're great at making bad decisions but pretty much nothing else.

DO NOT GIVE THIS GAME YOUR TIME.
